member.name: SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES_HASH
member.summary: The SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES_HASH structure specifies a hash values for the specified array of security identifiers (SIDs).

member.name: SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES_HASH.SidCount
member.summary: The number of SIDs pointed to by the SidAttr parameter.

member.name: SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES_HASH.SidAttr
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures that represent SIDs and their attributes.

summary.para: An array of pointers to hash values. These values correspond to the structures pointed to by the SidAttr parameter.
The SID_HASH_ENTRY data type is defined in Winnt.h as a ULONG_PTR.
The SID_HASH_SIZE array dimension is defined in Winnt.h as 32.
